text: Suicide hotline called the cops I often feel very down and have suffered from suicidal thoughts for my entire life   I was encouraged to call the suicide hotline if I ever I felt the need to talk to someone   Well I did  And they called the cops   But the cops couldn t find my house  so they dropped in on a few neighbors asking for me   When the cops finally did find me and knocked on the door and I opened it  several neighbors were standing across the street watching the cops and EMS truck parked in my driveway   The cops wanted my name and now I have a police file   The cops said anyone could access this file if they wanted to get my story   And that s that   Now my neighbors are talking  there s a police record on me and I will never  ever  ever call a suicide hotline again  regardless of how I feel   I m not suggesting you don t call if you re really in danger  but if you re calling because you just need someone to talk to  don t be surprised if your life is really messed up afterwards when the police come to chat    PS  At first I didn t want to give the cops my name  but when they threatened to put me in cuffs  arrest me and take me to the station  I told them who I was   I live in a small town  the neighbors are really nosey  the local cops now know who I am  and so I am now thinking about moving because the shame I feel is tremendous  Calling a suicide hotline has left me more suicide than before I called   How ironic
summary: Suicide hotline called the cops. The cops couldn't find her house, so they dropped in on a few neighbors asking for her. When she opened the door, several neighbors were standing across the street watching the cops and EMS truck parked in her driveway. Now the cops have a police file on her. She lives in a small town. She is considering moving.
cleaned: suicide hotline call cop cop not find house drop neighbour ask open door neighbour stand street watch cop ems truck park driveway cop police file live small town consider move

text: There s no solution for me  now  Started balding at   Tried rogaine for a couple years  rogaine   finasteride   ketoconazole for   years  rogaine   dutasteride   ketoconazole for   years  Nothing has helped    Just shave it right  Wrong  I was born with craniosynostosis  I have probably the world s biggest  oblong  bumpy head  This condition is usually fixed in infancy but wasn t for me  fuck my parents  Have had   surgeries as an adult which have helped in a very minor way  but just left me with several scalp scars and no real improvement  once the skull is set there s no going back    Get a wig  Nope  Had   different wig people tell me my head is too bumpy and large to get any reasonable coverage with a wig  even a full wig    Transplant  No  Not only can I not afford it  I do n t have the hair density to cover my NW  self    Wear a hat  Can t do it at work  Not only that but I have literally only ever found   hat that fits me    Because it was custom made for me  I have tried size     hats at the hat store  they don t fit    I m fucking sick of my family and friends making fun of me  I m sick of the people staring at me at the grocery store  I m sick of the social anxiety and depression  Tried meds  counseling  etc  so don t bring that up      So its over for me  I just want to say thanks for this community  It gave me some hope in the beginning at least    Bye
summary: There is no solution for balding. I was born with craniosynostosis and I have a big, oblong, bumpy head. I can't afford a wig or a full wig. I have only found a hat that fits me because it was custom made for me.
